name: Diceation
description:
This game was submitted at 1 Day 21 hours before the deadline ,and is for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Keep in mind, this is one of my first games, so it wont be perfect.

The game is short due to a gamemaker glitch.

I gave myself a challenge to make the game in 12 hours but I got burned out so this is the final product for now.
